content.question: The formal qualities of Ernst Ludwig Kirchner’s Self-Portrait as a Soldier demonstrate the influence of

choices.label: Cubist reduction of compositions to geometric elements
the Fauves’ use of bold colors for emotional impact
photography’s ability to capture fleeting moments

content.answer: the Fauves’ use of bold colors for emotional impact

topic.text: 4.1: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in Later European and American Art

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Explain the influence of a specific work of art (or group of related works of art) on other artistic production within or across cultures.
